mapper.select: select s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_tel, s.shop_desc, s.shop_addr, s.priority, s.shop_img, s.create_time, s.last_edit_time, s.status, s.shop_advice, a.area_id, a.area_name, sc.shopcategory_id, sc.shopcategory_name from tb_shop s, tb_area a, tb_shopcategory sc where s.shop_area_id=a.area_id and s.shop_shopcategory_id=sc.shopcategory_id and s.shop_id=#{shopId};
mapper.insert: insert into tb_shop (shop_name, priority, shop_img, shop_addr, shop_desc, shop_tel, shop_advice, status, create_time, last_edit_time, shop_area_id, shop_user_id, shop_shopcategory_id) values (#{shopName},#{priority},#{shopImg},#{shopAddr},#{shopDesc},#{shopTel},#{shopAdvice},#{status} ,#{createTime},#{lastEditTime},#{area.areaId},#{user.userId},#{shopCategory.shopCategoryId});
